title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin pauses on all the optimism for the Browns after trading for Deshaun Watson and why Baker Mayfield was destined to fail in Cleveland. He tells you why he was right about Aaron Rodgers and wrong about Von Miller. He reacts to the Colts trading for Matt Ryan as their latest QB to try and lead the franchise forward after Andrew Luck's surprise retirement several years ago. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst T. J. Houshmandzadeh joins the show to give his thoughts on where Mayfield could play in 2022. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
